p: The microorganisms S. aureus ATCC 6538, P. aeruginosa ATCC 9027, E. coli ATCC 25922, and C. albicans ATCC 10231 were purchased from the Bioresource Collection and Research Center (Hsinchu, Taiwan). E. coli, P. aeruginosa, and S. aureus were incubated at 37 °C in TSB. C. albicans was cultured at 30 °C in YMPD medium (0.3% yeast extract, 0.3% malt extract, 0.5% peptone, and 1% dextrose).
